definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: orphan (NH id.; Aram. [[יַתְמָא]], yatmo0; Ph. [[יתם]]; Ar. yatiymun pupil, orphan)—[[יׇתוֹם]] Ex 22:21 + 29 t.; pl. [[יְתוֹמִים]] v:Ex 22:23 + 8 t.; sf. [[יְתׂמֶיְ]] Je 49:11; [[יְתׂמָיו]] Is 9:16; [[לִיתוֹמָיו]] Ps 109:12; —orphan, i.e. fatherless (‖[[אַלְמָנׇה]]) Ex 22:23, Ps 109:9, La 5:3 (‖[[אַין אָב]]); Job 24:9, Ps 109:12; prob. also Ex 22:21, De 10:18, De 14:29, De 16:11, De 16:14, De 24:17, De 24:19, De 24:20, De 24:21, De 26:12, De 26:13, De 27:19, Ps 94:6, Ps 146:9, Je 7:6, Je 22:3, Zec 7:10, Mal 3:5 (in all these, mentioned as helpless, exposed to injury, ‖[[אַלְמָנׇה]] and [[גֵּר]]); similarly, ‖[[אַלְמָנׇה]] Job 22:9, Job 24:3, Job 29:12, Job 31:17, Ps 68:6, Is 1:17, Is 1:23, Is 9:16, Is 10:2, Je 49:11, Ez Eze 22:7; without [[אלמנה]] Ho 14:4, Job 6:27, Job 31:21, Ps 10:14, Ps 10:18, Pr 23:10, Je 5:28 (in no case clear that both parents are dead).
